name: Manya Imran

projects.title: Unleashing the Power of AI with OpenAI’s GPT-3
projects.description: Generative AI, Python, OpenAI, Transformers, Python, Java, GoLang, StreamLit, Docker, DockerHub : Created prompt engineering modules to test the fine-tuned OpenAI LLM. Explored the OpenAI API in external environments to test Natural Language Processing tasks like named-entity recognition, text summarization, and tokenization

projects.title: Medical Images Anomaly Detection PyTorch/Tensorflow
projects.description: Machine Learning, Python, Matplotlib, CNN, ResNet, PyTorch, Tensorflow: Developed a project that builds neural networks to detect anomaly in anomalies in cell images of malaria patients that led to 98% accuracy

projects.title: LLM-powered Chat Assistant using RAG
projects.description: Machine Learning, Python, Chatbot, RAG, Vector Stores, Embeddings, Agents: Leveraged the Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) to create a chat assistant to inquire the company documentation and policies enhancing user interaction by 25%

projects.title: Website Traffic Analysis using Machine Learning
projects.description: Machine Learning, Python, SARIMA, Seasonal Forecasting, Correlation: Leveraged the use of seasonal decompose and SARIMAX model to predict the traffic on website

projects.title: BrilliantPro - Corporate training LMS
projects.description: Developed a MERN application providing dynamic front-end interfaces enabling effective learner management. The application provides real-time changes to the user interface and efficient backend logic integration to minimize response time by 86%

projects.title: Book Recommendation System
projects.description: Machine Learning, Python, TF-IDF, Cosine Similarity, Plotly: Leveraged the use of vectorizer and cosine similarity function to recommend books on user preferences

services.title: AI/ML Development
services.description: I design and develop scalable and robust solution to machine learning problems using artificial intelligence algorithms and dats scirnce techniques.

services.title: Software Design and Development
services.description: I design and develop web applications having great user experience, aesthetic visuals, strong responsiveness and boosts user engagement.

services.title: Event Management
services.description: I lead teams to conduct events like workshops, hackathons, seminars and webinars to raise awareness on the new trends in the tech world

services.title: Technical Documentation
services.description: I use industry-standards to maintain the documentation for projects created, use advanced architectural diagrams and designs to document the procedure.

aboutpara:
Skilled and experienced Software Developer with 1.5 years experience of AI/ML development, Python Development, Web Development, API Development, and Full stack development. My research is in large language models, Generative models, and Transformers.I work on LLMs, BERT, transformers, attention mechanisms, sequence-to-sequence architecture, and interpretability in Machine Learning. I work with prompt engineering modules to test the fine-tuned OpenAI LLM. Exploring OpenAI capabilities in Natural Language Processing tasks like named-entity recognition, text summarization, and tokenization. 
 I create Full-stack applications with the backend focused on AI and an easy-to-use frontend.

resume.tagline: Hi, I'm a Software Developer with focus on AI/ML and Full-stack development
resume.description: Skilled and experienced Software Developer with 1.5 years experience of AI/ML development, Python Development, Web Development, API Development, and Full stack development.

experiences.bullets: Creating 4 Prompt Engineering projects with OpenAI API integration (Python-Java-Streamlit-and Go) that contributed to increase traffic by 55% to the GenAI vertical over a six month period, Researched and developed 15 Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning projects including mask detection achieving 98% accuracy rate and LLM-powered RAG chat assistant having 99% accuracy rate, Contributed 48 articles on deep learning and secure coding generating up to 91.6k SEO volume that lead to a 40% increase in website traffic and user engagement

experiences.position: Full Stack Developer at Protect Lab
experiences.bullets: Created a scalable Learning Management System for safeguarding internet usage for banks and intelligence agencies using a series of 10 simulation labs improving cybersecurity training efficiency by 30%, Successfully presented 12 robust and responsive labs that used API to fetch data from servers with real-time data syncing and representation on the web application - to 10 clients on a monthly basis, Created 8-10 full-stack projects that led to 70% increase in user engagement and system performance

experiences.position: Teaching Assistant  at National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences
experiences.bullets: Structured courses and assessment for 4 courses with 100 students each achieving a 95% of student satisfaction, Assisted the professors in conducting research leading to 45% increase in research efficiency

experiences.position: Cyber Defense and Network Security - Apprenticeship at ThincsCorp
experiences.bullets: Completed SOC activities of monitoring-threat detection-triggers generation and mitigation, CVE identification was also performed and reported that reduced threat response time by 40%

education.universityName: FAST National University of Computer and Emerging Sciences
education.universityPara: Bachelor of Cybersecurity, 1st | Grade: 3.49 | Dissertation: SecureWatch: a Security Training Platform | Awards: Silver Medal (III, IV), Dean’s List of Honors Inscription (III, IV, V, VIII)
